title: Birthday Party Mug Cake
directions: STEP 1 Place butter into 12-ounce coffee mug; microwave 30-45 seconds or until melted. Add all remaining cake ingredients except sprinkles; mix well with fork. Stir in sprinkles.
STEP 2 Microwave 45-60 seconds or until cake pulls away from sides and top is dry. (Do not overcook.) Cool 1 minute. Top with vanilla ice cream or whipped cream, as desired. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 large Land O Lakes® Egg (yolk only)
Vanilla ice cream or whipped cream, as desired
